message: Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $1800000. It's a significant investment, but I believe it will be highly profitable for you. Let's discuss further!
I'm interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your position.  While $1400000 is a good starting point, I'm looking to get closer to $1600000 to make this deal work for me.  Would you be willing to bridge the gap a bit?
I understand your concerns, but $1600000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1520000. Can you consider this revised offer?
